title: Having packet loss issues
body: I ran the internet checker tool on the self help page where you find the hextech tool. I have logs and everything. Discovered moderate packet loss. In game I get 32ping never spiked but 1-3 second freezes. It didn't say disconnecting or any of that. Is this something I need to call my isp about?

replies.body:
ISP issues would mostly contribute consistent higher pings.  It could cause spikes as well, but is usually a result of an unstable local connection.  Start off with each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities and get this fixed up.

If that doesn't help, you can grab the logs from the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can assist you directly!
